FuncDef: The clear alarm history command clears a specific or all historical alarms. The clear alarm history command clears a specific or all historical alarms.

ParaDef.Info:
Clears the sequence number of a historical alarm.
The value is an integer ranging from 1 to 4294967295.

ExtraInfo: After a historical alarm that has been triggered by a fault is not needed because the fault has been rectified, run the clear alarm history command to clear the historical alarm.
